column2: "Yo, partner. That Matoi girl isn't with you today?"
"I've been seeing you two together a lot lately, so it feels kind of weird when you're not."
"Which reminds me, I was with you when we found her."

"And then again when we met that Dark Falz... The one who turned out to be my older sister.
...That makes twice."
"I've been searching alone, but maybe I have better luck finding people when I'm working with you."
"...Well, it's not like she'd listen to me if I found her."
"...Ah, what am I doing? Saying things like that now is only going to make me lose my nerve."
"Partner, you didn't give up, even when all of ARKS had turned against you. I can't let myself be beaten either."
"Alright, I'm feeling better now. Thanks, partner! See you later!"
